entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
